mapper.select: select o.order_code, o.orderer, o.order_date, o.receiver, o.receiver_tel, o.shipping_address, l.mylist_id, l.id, l.code, l.sort, l.amount, p.id as seller_id, p.name as product_name, p.price from tb_order o, tb_mylist l, tb_product p where o.order_code = l.order_code and l.code = p.code and o.order_code = #{order_code}
